name: Php Log Analyzer
short_description: Php Log Analyzer (aka PLA) is a Log Analysis tool for Apache. There are lots of log analyzer softwares available on the internet but most of them have their own data storage ways. PLA is a tool to analyze log files and store results into MySQL databases.
